titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to limit the timing of issuance of H-2B visas during a fiscal year.
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to limit the timing of issuance of H-2B visas during a fiscal year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to limit the issuance of H-2B (temporary nonagricultural workers) visas during any fiscal year to not more than one-third of the total during the first four months of the fiscal year and not more than two-thirds of the total during the first eight months of the fiscal year.
